General.Name: Country Heights Holdings Bhd
General.Description: Country Heights Holdings Berhad engages in the property development, investment, hotel and resort management, healthcare, event planning and exhibitions, and timeshare businesses in Malaysia and South Africa. It operates through three segments: Property Development, Property Investment, and Hospitality and Health. The company develops residential and commercial properties, office suites, and golf courses; and leases offices, and exhibition and convention centers. It also provides property management and trading, marketing, hotel and resort management, trade directory, and pre-school education and related services; healthcare packages and timeshare memberships; private medical care facilities and services, as well as medical related facilities and services to the public; event management services; and fine and casual dining, and catering services, as well as operates hotels, Japanese restaurant, estate clubs, and boat clubs. In addition, the company is involved in the warehousing and storage services; visa application processing services; selling private healthcare memberships; letting promotion space; promotion activities; big data and IT related services; and marketing health screening, and palm oil memberships. Further, it operates as a travel agent and tour operator; and wholesales and retails various parts, components, supplies, tools, and accessories for motor vehicles. The company was incorporated in 1984 and is based in Seri Kembangan, Malaysia.
